snippet: The agency said the lack of funds had forced it to cut back on vital customer services like help over the phone.
abstract: Nina E Olson, national taxpayer advocate at the Internal Revenue Service, issues report finding that additional funding for agency would help make tax collection less frustrating and more efficient.
lead_paragraph: The agency said the lack of funds had forced it to cut back on vital customer services like help over the phone.

headline.main: Ombudswoman for I.R.S. Tells Congress It Needs More Funding to Aid Its Work
headline.print_headline: Ombudswoman for I.R.S. Tells Congress It Needs More Funding to Aid Its Work
